cat('

<h3>Simple webR Calculation</h3>

::: {#webr-output}
Calculating...
:::

```{=html}
<script type="module">
async function runSimpleR() {
  // Initialize webR if not already done
  if (!window.webr) {
    const { WebR } = await import("https://webr.r-wasm.org/latest/webr.mjs");
    window.webr = new WebR();
    await webr.init();
  }

  // Run simple R code
  const result = await webr.evalR("1 + 2 + 3");
  document.getElementById("webr-output").innerText = "R says: " + result.toString();
}

// Run the async function
runSimpleR();
</script>
```
